description: After installing the latest security updates for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.97 (KB-119.0.2151.97), users may experience noticeable performance degradation when using the browser. This could manifest as slower loading times for web pages, delays in rendering multimedia content, and increased CPU usage during normal operations. It's essential for system administrators to be aware of these potential issues, particularly when managing multiple endpoints needing updates associated with this build.
